Klasse ThemeDAO_MariaDB

java.lang.Object
persistence.DataAccessObject
persistence.mariaDB.MariaAccessObject
persistence.mariaDB.dao.ThemeDAO_MariaDB
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class ThemeDAO_MariaDB extends MariaAccessObject
MariaDB Data Access Object (DAO) for quiz themes.

Maps the "Theme" table rows to ThemeDTO and vice versa. Provides CRUD operations and validation logic for theme entities.

Database columns include:

  • id (INT): primary key
  • title (VARCHAR): theme title
  • description (TEXT): theme description

Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios
